fire_extinguisher_safety_1.description: Are portable fire extinguishers either securely wall mounted or on a supplied stand?

fire_extinguisher_safety_2.description: Are all portable fire extinguishers readily accessible and not restricted by stored items?

fire_extinguisher_safety_3.description: Are portable fire extinguishers clearly labelled?

plug_safety_1.description: Are sockets not overloaded by use of multiplugs?

waste_check_1.description: Is waste and rubbish kept in a designated area and collected regularly?

fire_hazard_check_1.description: Have combustible materials been stored away from sources of ignition?

fire_point_check_1.description: Are all fire alarm call points clearly signed and easily accessible?

fire_escape_area_check_1.description: Are fire escape routes kept clear?

fire_escape_area_check_2.description: Are all fire exit signs in place?

fire_escape_area_check_3.description: Are all fire exit signs unobstructed?

fire_door_check_1.description: Are fire doors not wedged open, or kept closed?

trip_hazard_check_1.description: Is the condition of all flooring free from trip hazards?
